newsitem.title: USA: CSX Corp senior VP Ermer retires.
newsitem.headline: CSX Corp senior VP Ermer retires.

text.p: CSX Corp said on Monday that executive vice president-corporate planning and development James Ermer will retire effective January 1, 1997.

Ermer served as senior vice president-finance and chief financial officer from 1985 to 1995, when he was succeeded as CFO by Paul R. Goodwin. Since then, Ermer has been executive vice president in charge of corporate planning and development, handling special projects, the company said.
The company did not comment on who would replace Ermer.
